item.title: Oh Hellâ€¦
item.author: tuirgin.blog@gmail.com (Christopher D. Walborn)
item.description: 2018 Update: I wrote these messages 11 years ago and numerous features of my beliefs have changed since that time. The core message stands. I refuse to believe that God is worse than me. I refuse to believe that God is a monster.
